answers.answer: has your doctor suggested that you meet with a nutritionist at all?  At your age, it's probably the best first step. Also if your parents are over weight, try to involve the entire family in starting to exercise and eat healthier :)  Does your school have any healthy eating programs? What about your local ymca or community center?As for picking a goal weight, the best way to do that is based on your height. the nutritionist/dietician can help you with that too.grace

question: Im 12 and weigh 170 lbs i got asthma and diabetes in my family. i wanna be 100 lbs by next year. any advice?
title: help
